Sentencas: The global electricity supply from non-hydro renewables, mainly wind and solar, is currently growing at a high rate, and it is expected that this trend persists.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: In the near-to-medium term, the power produced by breakthrough fossil fuel technologies might also grow intensively.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: These expansion patterns can be optimized in a regional context, which translates into a multidimensional problem.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: As part of the solution, a procedure to determine maximum allowable growth rates for alternative power-generation technologies is developed and exemplified in this paper.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: The model applies a dynamic exergy analysis based oil the cumulative exergy-consumption concept, expanded to include emissions abatement.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: A Gompertz sigmoid growth is assumed and constrained by both exergetic self-sustenance and regional energy resource availability.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: Far West Texas is the selected study region.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: The deployment of alternative technologies (wind turbines, photovoltaics, hybrid solar thermal parabolic troughs, and solid oxide fuel cells) to meet the regional power demand is projected assuming backup capacity by a conventional technology (natural gas combined cycle).
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas

Sentencas: The results show that during the next decades the new capacity demand may largely be met by deploying alternative technologies, with a cost in primary resources that can be minimized through a proper allowance for exergy reinvestment.
Titulo: Dynamic exergy analysis for capacity expansion of regional power-generation systems: Case study of far West Texas
